alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 1:55PM PST until January 20 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 2 inches possible below 5000 feet and up to 5 inches above 5000 feet. Locally higher amounts possible over 9000 feet. Southwest winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions along the Red Rock Scenic Loop, Kyle Canyon Road, Lee Canyon Road, and Deer Creek Road.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
